maxlength

restrict: 'A'

Name Type Desciption
maxlength object this directive is for only input and TextAreas,on input maxlength nativelly keep the text length as desired, on Textareas letters counts and doesn't let the lenght of letters exceed mmCounter Returns how many letters left, maxlength enables the directive
mmCounter numeric Returns how many letters left
labelit bool *Not Implemented Yet, if true Append a label next to input or TextArea to show how many letter left 
<input class="form-control" maxlength="15" mm-counter="counter" />
<label >{{counter}}</label>
<textarea class="form-control" maxlength="144" mm-counter="counter2"></textarea>
<label>{{counter2}}</label>
